title: ULTRASONOGRAPHIC STUDY IN DIAGNOSIS OF APPENDICITIS IN RAJASTHAN POPULATION
details: MM Sule, S Nayak, D Goswami - Int J Acad Med Pharm, 2025
abstract: Background: Acute appendicitis is the most common emergency. Hence, imaging methods such as Ultrasound are safer to predict the fatal consequences in case of pain in Right Iliac fossa, in all age groups at the earliest. Materials and Methods: 96 …
